CIRCULAR  NO.   08    /  2002 
 
 
SUB : RANDOM PHYSICAL CHECKING OF REGISTERED 
BAGGAGE AFTER X-RAY SCREENING 
 
 
 
Attention is invited to this Bureau Circular of even Number dated 
13.4.1997. 
 
It has been observed that the required number of Registered Baggages is 
not physically checked at random. 
 
 
In order to prevent weapons, explosives or any other dangerous 
devices which may be used to commit an act of unlawful interference through the 
Registered Baggage, it is imperative that 15 % of Registered Baggage should be 
checked physically at random inclusive of suspected Registered Baggages after 
X-ray screening.  These instructions shall come into force with immediate effect. 
 
(R. K. Singh) 
Addl Commissioner of  Security (CA) 
 
 
NO.CAS-25(2)/98-DIV-1  Date   : 04.03.2002
